self_text: I'm trying to make a custom block with the same functionality as a furnace, but it won't accept any items into its inventory. Is there something I can do?  I would like to have a crafting recipe that outputs the block too, so if you could explain how that works, that would be great!

title: Why can’t I play in a server?

It says “Failed to connect to server” with an error message that says “The authentication servers are currently unavailable.”  I have tried restarting my computer, reinstalling Minecraft, and clearing the cache but nothing works! Does anyone know how to fix this problem?

I can understand if someone wants to play a specific mod that only works on a certain version of Minecraft, but other than that, why does it matter?

title: My new seed! (Java)
self_text: Hello, I found a really cool seed for my Minecraft Java world today and wanted to share it with you all! It’s pretty big and has lots of different biomes, like jungle, savanna, desert, forest and plains. There are also some interesting structures around the spawn point, such as a woodland mansion and a ruined portal.  Seed: -3489015276751999665   I hope you all enjoy playing on this seed and let me know what you think!
